subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Robbie Gould kicked a 41-yard field goal as time expired after Jay Cutler recovered from a first-half beating to rally the Chicago Bears in the fourth quarter for a 23-22 win over the visiting Carolina Panthers on Sunday.
snippet: Robbie Gould kicked a 41-yard field goal as time expired after Jay Cutler recovered from a first-half beating to rally the Chicago Bears in the fourth quarter for a 23-22 win over the visiting Carolina Panthers on Sunday.
